summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and handling fees, and specifies the payment due date. The invoice highlights a discount applied to the total charges.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-093-91462, dated February 25, 2002.
The total amount due on the invoice is $40.31.
The payment is due by March 12, 2002.
The invoice includes a discount of $11.04 applied to the total charges.
The package was picked up on February 18, 2002, and delivered on February 19, 2002.
